content: Hi David, We luckily haven’t had to deal with many legacy systems, but the few times we had to we tried to get at least a couple of people ramped up on it — even if it’s scheduled to be decommissioned. The rationale is that we try to cover the Bus factor by having “jacks of all trades” (instead of experts) in the team who can deal with issues affecting any part of the project (legacy, deployment pipeline, live site issues, etc.).
